root.name: Snoopy Tennis
root.description: Overview Charlie Brown and 11 of his friends take to the courts for a heated round of tennis. Set across 9 different courts, characters are ranked by their Serve, Speed, Stroke, and Volley skills and their performance is graded on several stats. Five modes of play are offered including Traditional Tennis, a Power-Up mode where ability-augmenting pick-ups drop onto the court, a Points Race mode, Sudden Win and Squash. Multiplayer modes require a Game Boy Link Cable.
